summary: Recoloured tavern wench clothes dark red and added a small gold diamond trim from the Emperor\'s robes.
descriptionHtml:
Recoloured tavern wench clothes dark red and added a small gold diamond trim from the Emperor\'s robes. I also bleached the hand-towel on her hip and added a small embroidery to it.

I\'m aware there are issues with this file as it\'s the first mod work of any kind I\'ve done for an elder scroll game, let alone Skyrim. 

extract to *skyrim/data/ and merge with your textures folder, assuming you have one.

Please let me know how I can improve my work.
author: Talaaty
